data.name: BasicAuthorizationHeaderInvalidFormat
data.value: Authorization header doesn't start with Basic
data.comment: Message shown when the basic authentication header format is invalid

data.name: AuthorizationHeaderNotFound
data.comment: Message shown when the authorization header is missing

data.name: Base64ConversionError
data.comment: Message shown when Base64 decoding fails

data.name: BasicCredentialsDontMatch
data.comment: Message shown when username and password do not match

data.name: FailedToCreateIdentityUser
data.comment: Message shown when creating the Identity user fails

data.name: InvalidCredentialFormat
data.comment: Message shown when the credential format is incorrect

data.name: FailedToCreateDevUser
data.comment: Message shown when creating the development user fails, {0} will be replaced with error descriptions

data.name: ContextResourceIsNotHttpContext
data.comment: Message shown when authorizing the request context.Resource's type is not Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext

data.name: NameIdentifierClaimMissing
data.comment: Message shown when NameIdentifier claim is missing in json web token.

data.name: InvalidOrMissingAPIKey
data.comment: Message shown when user has invalid or missing api key

data.name: ResourceNotFound
data.comment: Message shown when a resource not found in environment.

data.name: HandlerMethodNotFound
data.comment: Message shown when handler of a request not found.

data.name: AnErrorOccured
data.comment: Message shown when a error occured without a custom message.

data.name: ValidationFailed
data.value: One or more validation errors occurred.

data.name: Unauthorized
data.value: You are not authorized to perform this action.

data.name: Forbidden
data.value: You do not have permission to access this resource.

data.name: RequestCancelled
data.value: The request was cancelled by the client.

data.name: NamespaceNameCannotBeEmpty
data.comment: Message shown when namespace name is empty or whitespace

data.name: NamespaceNameTooLong
data.comment: Message shown when namespace name exceeds maximum length

data.name: NamespaceSlugCannotBeEmpty
data.comment: Message shown when namespace slug is empty or whitespace

data.name: NamespaceSlugInvalidFormat
data.value: Namespace slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens
data.comment: Message shown when namespace slug contains invalid characters

data.name: NamespaceSlugTooLong
data.comment: Message shown when namespace slug exceeds maximum length

data.name: NamespaceStatusCannotBeEmpty
data.comment: Message shown when namespace status is empty

data.name: NamespaceStatusInvalid
data.value: Invalid status. Must be one of: {0}
data.comment: Message shown when namespace status is not a valid value

data.name: NamespaceVersionCannotBeEmpty
data.comment: Message shown when namespace version is empty

data.name: NamespaceVersionInvalidFormat
data.comment: Message shown when version doesn't match semantic versioning pattern

data.name: PublisherIdentifierCannotBeEmpty
data.comment: Message shown when publisher identifier is empty

data.name: AtLeastOneLanguageRequired
data.value: At least one language must be supported
data.comment: Message shown when namespace has no supported languages

data.name: InvalidLanguageCode
data.value: All language codes must be 2-letter ISO codes
data.comment: Message shown when language code is not in valid format

data.name: PublishedDateCannotBeFuture
data.value: Published date cannot be in the future
data.comment: Message shown when published date is set to future

data.name: NamespaceIdCannotBeEmpty
data.comment: Message shown when namespace ID is empty GUID

data.name: CannotUpdateArchivedNamespace
data.value: Cannot update name of archived namespace
data.comment: Message shown when trying to update archived namespace

data.name: CannotChangePublishedSlug
data.value: Cannot change slug of published or archived namespace
data.comment: Message shown when trying to change slug of published namespace

data.name: NamespaceAlreadyPublished
data.comment: Message shown when trying to publish already published namespace

data.name: CannotPublishArchivedNamespace
data.comment: Message shown when trying to publish archived namespace

data.name: NamespaceAlreadyDraft
data.value: Namespace is already in draft status
data.comment: Message shown when trying to unpublish draft namespace

data.name: CannotUnpublishArchivedNamespace
data.comment: Message shown when trying to unpublish archived namespace

data.name: NamespaceAlreadyArchived
data.comment: Message shown when trying to archive already archived namespace

data.name: OnlyArchivedCanBeRestored
data.value: Only archived namespaces can be restored
data.comment: Message shown when trying to restore non-archived namespace

data.name: CannotModifyArchivedNamespace
data.comment: Message shown when trying to modify archived namespace

data.name: NamespaceMustSupportOneLanguage
data.value: Namespace must support at least one language
data.comment: Message shown when trying to remove last language from namespace

data.name: InvalidVersionBumpType
data.comment: Message shown when version bump type is invalid
